title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.706 - Transmission lines: leakage surveys
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.706 - Transmission lines: leakage surveys

State Regulations
(a) A leakage survey of each transmission
line, and distribution main operating at 125 psig (862 kPa) or more in a Class
3 or 4 location, must be conducted at intervals not exceeding 15 months, but at
least once each calendar year. (b) Leaks located shall be investigated promptly, and necessary action shall be
taken in accordance with sections 255.805 and
255.807
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.706

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
